title: DLC Colab train_network
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

While running the code for train_network, then FileNotFoundError comes up.

### Operating System

Google Colab

### DeepLabCut version

DLC 2.2.1.1

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

GPU

### Steps To Reproduce

1. In Google Colab
2. Run the code for train_network() with the correct paths

### Relevant log output

```shell
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-f5c1f8f7a264> in <module>()
      3 #more info and there are more things you can set: https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/master/docs/functionDetails.md#g-train-the-network
      4 
----> 5 deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file, shuffle=SHUF, displayiters=10,saveiters=500)
      6 
      7 #this will run until you stop it (CTRL+C), or hit "STOP" icon, or when it hits the end (default, 1.03M iterations).

4 frames
/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, max_snapshots_to_keep, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, allow_growth, gputouse, autotune, keepdeconvweights)
    132         train(str(poseconfigfile),displayiters,saveiters,maxiters,max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep,keepdeconvweights=keepdeconvweights,allow_growth=allow_growth) #pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml!
    133     except BaseException as e:
--> 134         raise e
    135     finally:
    136         os.chdir(str(start_path))

/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, max_snapshots_to_keep, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, allow_growth, gputouse, autotune, keepdeconvweights)
    130             os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = str(gputouse)
    131     try:
--> 132         train(str(poseconfigfile),displayiters,saveiters,maxiters,max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep,keepdeconvweights=keepdeconvweights,allow_growth=allow_growth) #pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml!
    133     except BaseException as e:
    134         raise e

/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/train.py in train(config_yaml, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, max_to_keep, keepdeconvweights, allow_growth)
    111     setup_logging()
    112 
--> 113     cfg = load_config(config_yaml)
    114     if cfg.dataset_type=='default' or cfg.dataset_type=='tensorpack' or cfg.dataset_type=='deterministic':
    115         print("Switching batchsize to 1, as default/tensorpack/deterministic loaders do not support batches >1. Use imgaug loader.")

/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py in load_config(filename)
     54 
     55 def load_config(filename = "pose_cfg.yaml"):
---> 56     return cfg_from_file(filename)
     57 
     58 if __name__ == "__main__":

/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py in cfg_from_file(filename)
     40     """Load a config from file filename and merge it into the default options.
     41     """
---> 42     with open(filename, 'r') as f:
     43         yaml_cfg = edict(yaml.load(f,Loader=yaml.SafeLoader))
     44 

FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'drive/MyDrive/Pupillometry/models/resnet50/Pupillometry 9 marker model-Project-2022-06-22/dlc-models/iteration-0/Pupillometry 9 marker modelJun22-trainset95shuffle1/train/pose_cfg.yaml'
```


### Anything else?

_No response_
